volunteers.name: Udit Singh
volunteers.role: Full-Stack Developer | Aspiring AI Engineer | Data Science Undergraduate
volunteers.bio: I'm a B.Tech student at GNIOT with experience in Vue.js, React, and Django. I completed a 6-month internship at Agratas Infotech and enjoy building user-focused applications while continuously expanding my skills in web and software development. Passionate about frontend standards, accessibility, and sharing insights with the community.
achievements: Published a research paper on 'Web-Ecosystem for Students with Special Needs.'
Successfully delivered and maintained 3+ active websites.
Currently leading frontend development for a major project with cross-functional coordination.
Qualified in the Top 15 teams at AM Hacks 2025, a national-level hackathon.
testimonials: Udit is a detail-oriented developer who brings design and code together effortlessly. – Agratas Infotech Teammate
Has a strong vision for user interaction and modern frontend standards. – Project Collaborator
projects: ValueUTickets.com – CRM for a U.S. flight booking agency with flight API integration, mail scheduling, and admin tools.
GripChain.in – MEVN-stack e-commerce platform for packaging services, deployed via cPanel.
TrehousingPublication.com – Publishing site with Vue.js frontend and Django REST backend on separate domains.
Reusable Vue Components – Created responsive UI components for modular, scalable design.
volunteers.blog: I am passionate about sharing my journey and technical insights with the developer community. Through my personal blog, I break down complex frontend concepts, publish accessibility best practices, and offer step-by-step tutorials on modern web and AI tools. My goal is to create an open, inclusive space where learners at all levels can find inspiration and actionable knowledge to advance their own projects. I believe continuous learning and open sharing are the cornerstones of growth in tech.

volunteers.name: Vanshika Singh
volunteers.bio: I am a first-year undergraduate student pursuing Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. Passionate about the fast-paced world of technology, I am eager to explore innovations in AI, especially in robotics. I enjoy staying up to date with emerging trends and actively contribute to the growing tech ecosystem through volunteering, event participation, and peer collaboration.
achievements: Participated in Yukti – NRI Startup Competition
Attended multiple tech and AI/ML-focused events
Actively pursuing student ambassador roles in various tech communities
testimonials: Vanshika brings energy, curiosity, and a strong willingness to learn—essential traits in any tech volunteer. Her dedication to staying updated with AI trends sets her apart. – Peer, AI Student Community
An excellent team player and quick learner. Vanshika is always ready to explore, contribute, and grow with every opportunity.
volunteers.campus_connect: Involved in tech-related campus activities through volunteering, event participation, and peer collaboration. I aim to contribute toward a strong and connected tech culture within my institution by encouraging engagement, awareness, and innovation among students.

Combines a keen technical eye with artistic flair in every project. – Faculty Mentor
